mapper.sql: po.id, po.order_no, po.supplier_id, po.purchaser_id, po.purchase_date, po.total_amount, po.status, po.remark, po.create_time, po.update_time
mapper.select: select , s.supplier_name, u.username as purchaser_name from purchase_order po left join supplier s on po.supplier_id = s.id left join sys_user u on po.purchaser_id = u.id where po.id = #{id}

select poi.id as item_id, poi.purchase_order_id, poi.product_id, poi.quantity, poi.purchase_price, poi.amount, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.spec, p.unit from purchase_order_item poi left join product p on poi.product_id = p.id where poi.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
mapper.insert:
insert into purchase_order_item ( purchase_order_id, product_id, quantity, purchase_price, amount ) values
(#{item.purchaseOrderId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.purchasePrice}, #{item.amount})
